mapper.select: select ID_UPL ,IDTYPESLV_UPL ,START_TIME_UPL ,END_TIME_UPL ,TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL ,RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL ,ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL ,CREATED_ON_UPL ,CREATED_BY_UPL ,UPDATED_ON_UPL ,UPDATED_BY_UPL ,PARENT_ID_UPL from UPLOAD_LOG_UPL where IDTYPESLV_UPL = #{statusId}

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000020' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId', UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000003' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId', UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000004' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId', UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = #{typeId}
mapper.update: { call PROC_UPLOAD_TRANSPORTER ( #{uploadId, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
mapper.select: select INVOICE_NO as 'invoiceNo',LR_NO_TRT as 'lrNo',BOX_NO_TRT as 'boxNo',WEIGHT_TRT as 'weight', DISPATCH_DATE_TRT as 'dispatchDate', EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE_TRT as 'expectedDeliveryDate',ACTUAL_DELIVERY_DATE_TRT as 'actuallyDeliveryDate',NAME_TRN_TRT as 'trnName', DELIVERED_TO_NAME_TRT as 'deliveredToName',COST_OF_DELIVERY_TRT as 'deliveryCost',STATE_DOCET_TRT as 'docketState',ERROR_TEXT as 'errorText' from TEMP_TRANSPORT_DETAIL_TRT where ID_UPLOAD_UPL_TRT = #{id}
mapper.update: { call PROC_VALIDATE_GRN_UPLOAD (#{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}) }
mapper.select: select PO_NO_GRT as 'poNo',COST_CENTER_GRT as 'costCenter', MATERIAL_GRT as 'material',BATCH_NO_GRT as 'batchNo', MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION_GRT as 'materialDescription', POSTING_DATE_GRT as 'postingDate', QTY_IN_GRN as 'quantity',AMOUNT_GRT as 'amount',VENDOR_CODE_GRT as 'vendorCode',VENDOR_NAME_GRT as 'vendorName',RATE_PER_UNIT_GRT as 'ratePerUnit', MEDICAL_CODE_GRT as 'medicalCode', MAT_DOC_GRT as 'materialDoc',ITEM_NAME_GRT as 'itemNo',SAMPLE_EXPIRY_GRT as 'sampleExpiry',ERROR_TEXT as 'errorText',EXPIRY_DATE_GRT as 'expiryDate' from TEMP_GRN_UPLOAD_GRT where ID_UPLOAD_UPL_GRT = #{id}
mapper.update: { call PROC_RECIPIENT_UPLOAD (#{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}) }
mapper.select: select NAME_RTT as 'name',CODE_RTT as 'code',ADDRESS_RTT as 'address', CITY_RTT as 'city', STATE_RTT as 'state',ZIP_RTT as 'zip',EMAIL_RTT as 'email', MOBILE_RTT as 'mobile',DESIGNATION_RTT as 'designation',HQ_RTT as 'headquarter',ZONE_RTT as 'zone', JOINING_DATE_RTT as 'joiningDate',TEAM_RTT as 'team', STATUS_RTT as 'status',REMARKS_RTT as 'remarks',WORKID_RTT as 'workId',GENDER_RTT as 'gender',EMAIL_RM_RTT as 'emailRM', EMAIL_AM_RTT as 'emailAM',BUM_RTT as 'bu' from TEMP_RECIPIENT_RTT where ID_UPLOAD_UPL_RTT = #{id}
mapper.update: { call PROC_VIRTUAL_UPLOAD (#{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} , #{frommonth, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN} , #{tomonth, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN} ) }
mapper.select: select CREATEDBY_VLS as 'createdBy', USER_EMAIL_VLS as 'userEmail', EMP_ID_VLS as 'empId', SKU_VLS as 'sku', LOT_VLS as 'lot', EXTERNAL_VLS as 'externalId', CUSTOMER_VLS as 'customer', MOBILE_VLS as 'mobile', QUANTITY_VLS as 'quantity' , REQUEST_STATUS_VLS as 'requestStatus', TEAM_VLS as 'team', SUB_TEAM_VLS as 'subTeam', ADDRESS_VLS as 'address', STREET1_VLS as 'street1', STREET2_VLS as 'street2', STREET3_VLS as 'street3', CITY_VLS as 'city', STATE_VLS as 'state', POSTAL_CODE_VLS as 'postalCode', DATE_CREATED_VLS as 'dateCreated', REQUEST_COMPLETED_VLS as 'requestCompleted', REQUEST_STARTED_VLS as 'requestStarted', ERROR_TEXT as 'errorText' from TEMP_VIRTUALUPLOAD_VLS where UPLOAD_ID_VLS = #{id}
select ID_TRN as 'transporterId',NAME_TRN as 'transporterName' from TRANSPORTER_TRN where NAME_TRN = #{name}
SELECT ID_DTM as 'recipientId',NAME_DTM as 'recipientName',CODE_DTM as 'recipientCode',ID_DESG_ULV_DTM as 'recipientDesignationId' FROM DOCTOR_MASTER_DTM WHERE CODE_DTM = #{code}

select count(*) from RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT rct join INVOICE_HEADER_INH inh on rct.ID_RCT = inh.ID_RCT_INH join INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP idp on inh.ID_INH = idp.ID_INH_IDP join DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP dip on idp.ID_PLAN_IDP = dip.ID_DIP where dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecial} and dip.MONTH_DIP = #{month} and dip.YEAR_DIP = #{year} and rct.ID_RCT = #{employeeId}

select count(*) from VIRTUAL_UPLOAD_VRL vrl join INVOICE_HEADER_INH inh on vrl.ID_DTM_VRL = inh.ID_RCT_INH join INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP idp on inh.ID_INH = idp.ID_INH_IDP join DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP dip on idp.ID_PLAN_IDP = dip.ID_DIP join DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID did on vrl.ID_DID_VRL = did.ID_DID where dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = 1 and dip.IS_VIRTUAL_DIP = 1 and dip.MONTH_DIP = #{month} and dip.YEAR_DIP = #{year} and vrl.ID_DTM_VRL = #{employeeId} and idp.ID_PLAN_IDP = #{planId} and vrl.FF_CODE_VRL = #{ffCode} and did.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID = '986F1D6B-AF4B-4E80-AB09-9EC4F0CCDBE7'

SELECT ISNULL(SUM((DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) + (DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) * INV.RATE_PER_INV/100),0) as 'sampleItems' FROM SAMPLE_MASTER_SMP SMP JOIN INVENTORY_INV INV ON INV.ID_ITM_INV = SMP.ID_SMP JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DID.ID_INV_DID = INV.ID_INV JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID WHERE DID.ID_RCT_DID = #{recipientId} AND DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{IsSpecialDispatch} AND INV.ID_ITC_INV = '242B921C-B27A-497D-9FA1-7222AB6E6F2A'

SELECT ISNULL(SUM((DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) + (DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) * INV.RATE_PER_INV/100),0) as 'nonSampleItems' FROM ITEM_MASTER_ITM ITM JOIN INVENTORY_INV INV ON INV.ID_ITM_INV = ITM.ID_ITM JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DID.ID_INV_DID = INV.ID_INV JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID WHERE DID.ID_RCT_DID = #{recipientId} AND DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{IsSpecialDispatch} AND INV.ID_ITC_INV IN ('2909F268-96DE-4485-B8E9-673FEC08C9A3','9689A910-F261-48E7-9DCC-7653B092BA7B')

SELECT ID_DID AS 'id',ID_DIP_DID AS 'planId',ID_INV_DID AS 'inventoryId',ID_RCT_DID AS 'recipientId',QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID AS 'qtyDispatch',ID_QTP_DID AS 'quarterlyPlanId',ID_STATUS_SLV_DID AS 'detailStatus', REMARKS_DID AS 'remarks',CREATED_ON_DID AS 'createdAt', CREATED_BY_DID AS 'createdBy', UPDATED_ON_DID AS 'updatedAt', UPDATED_BY_DID AS 'updatedBy', ID_ITC_DID AS 'categoryId' FROM DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{IsSpecialDispatch} AND DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' AND DID.ID_RCT_DID = #{recipientId} AND DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID = '986F1D6B-AF4B-4E80-AB09-9EC4F0CCDBE7'

select ID_IVT as 'invoiceId', ID_UPLOAD_UPL_IVT as 'invoiceUploadId',MONTH_IVT as 'month',YEAR_IVT as 'year',NAME_PLAN_IVT as 'planName', STATE_IVT as 'state',EMPLOYEE_NAME_IVT as 'employeeName',EMPLOYEE_DESG_IVT as 'employeeDesignation', EMPLOYEE_CODE_IVT as 'employeeCode',BOXES_IVT as 'boxes',WEIGHT_IVT as 'weight',DIMENSION_IVT as 'dimension',TRANPORTER_NAME_IVT as 'transporterName',LR_NO_IVT as 'lrNo',ID_PLAN_IVT as 'planId',STREET2_IVT as 'planType',FFCODE_IVT as 'ffCode',ERROR_TEXT_IVT as 'errorText' from TEMP_INVOICE_UPLOAD_IVT where ID_UPLOAD_UPL_IVT = #{id}

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000030' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000021' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000023' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000024' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000025' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc

SELECT TOP 25 ID_UPL as 'uplId',UPL.START_TIME_UPL as 'startTime',UPL.END_TIME_UPL as 'endTime',UPL.TOTAL_RECORDS_UPL as 'totalRecord',UPL.RECORDS_UPLOAD_UPL as 'recordUpload', SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status' FROM UPLOAD_LOG_UPL UPL JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = UPL.ID_STATUS_SLV_UPL WHERE UPL.IDTYPESLV_UPL = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-100000000026' order by CREATED_ON_UPL desc
mapper.update: { call PROC_OPTIMAMI_UPLOAD ( #{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call PROC_COMPLIANCE_UPLOAD ( #{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call PROC_DETAILS_COMPLIANCE_UPLOAD ( #{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call PROC_OPTIMATERIAL_UPLOAD ( #{uploadid, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
mapper.select: SELECT ID_OMI AS 'optimaId', ID_UPLOAD_OMI AS 'optimaUploadId', EMPLOYEE_CODE_OMI AS 'empCode', MATERIAL_CODE_OMI AS 'materialCode', BATCH_NO_OMI AS 'batchNo', MONTH_OMI AS 'month', YEAR_OMI AS 'year', QTY_DISPATHCED_OMI AS 'qtyDispatched',QTY_VALIDATED_OMI AS 'qtyValidated', QTY_TRANSFERED_OMI AS 'qtyTransfered', QTY_BALANCE_OMI AS 'qtyBalance' , EXPIRY_DATE_OMI AS 'expiryDate' , ERROR_TEXT_OMI AS 'errorText', isvalidated AS 'isvalidated' FROM TEMP_UPLOAD_OPTIMA_MI_TOMI WHERE ID_UPLOAD_OMI = #{id}

SELECT ID_CMP AS 'overSamplingId', ID_UPLOAD_CMP AS 'overSamplingUploadId', FORMAT(START_DATE_CMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'startDate',FORMAT(END_DATE_CMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'endDate', FF_CMP AS 'ffCmp', DR_ID AS 'drCode', DR_NAME AS 'drName', TOT_SAMPLE_GIVEN AS 'totalSampleGiven', BU AS 'bu', AM AS 'am', RBM AS 'rbm', REMARKS AS 'remarks', ERROR_TEXT_CMP AS 'errorText',FF_CODE_CMP AS 'ffCode', TEAM_ID_CMP AS 'teamId', TEAM_NAME_CMP AS 'teamName' FROM TEMP_COMPLIANCE_UPLOAD_TCMP where ID_UPLOAD_CMP = #{id}

SELECT ID_CDS AS 'complianceDetailId',NAME_TERRITORY_CDS AS 'territoryName',ID_TERRITORY_CDS AS 'territoryId', ID_PERSON_CDS AS 'personId',NAME_PERSON_CDS AS 'personName',ID_LOCATION_CDS AS 'locationId', NAME_LOCATION_CDS AS 'locationName',FORMAT(VISITED_CDS,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS 'visited',ITEMCATEGORY_CDS AS 'itemCategory', ID_ITEM_CDS AS 'itemId',NAME_ITEM_CDS AS 'nameItem',BATCH_NO_CDS AS 'batchNo',QUANTITY_CDS AS 'quantity', SUBTEAM_CDS AS 'subTeam',TEAM_CDS AS 'team',AM_CDS AS 'am',RBM_CDS AS 'rbm',ID_UPLOAD_CDS AS 'complianceDetailUploadId', ERROR_TXT AS 'errorText',MONTH_CDS AS 'month' FROM TEMP_DETAILS_COMPLIANCE_CDS WHERE ID_UPLOAD_CDS = #{id}

SELECT ID_TMI AS 'optimaId', ID_UPLOAD_TMI AS 'optimaUploadId', EMPLOYEE_CODE_TMI AS 'empCode', MATERIAL_CODE_TMI AS 'materialCode', BATCH_NO_TMI AS 'batchNo', MONTH_TMI AS 'month', YEAR_TMI AS 'year', QTY_DISPATHCED_TMI AS 'qtyDispatched',QTY_VALIDATED_TMI AS 'qtyValidated', QTY_TRANSFERED_TMI AS 'qtyTransfered', QTY_BALANCE_TMI AS 'qtyBalance' , EXPIRY_DATE_TMI AS 'expiryDate' , ERROR_TEXT_TMI AS 'errorText', isvalidated AS 'isvalidated' FROM TEMP_UPLOAD_OPTIMA_MATERIAL_TMI WHERE ID_UPLOAD_TMI = #{id}
